puzzles.title: Whispering Walls
puzzles.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
puzzles.hint: You hear it when you're alone… and call out.

puzzles.title: The Candlestick Riddle
puzzles.question: The more you take away from me, the bigger I get. What am I?
puzzles.hint: You dig me… deeper and deeper.

puzzles.title: Tomb Room Clock
puzzles.question: What runs but never walks, has a bed but never sleeps?

puzzles.title: Portrait of Lies
puzzles.question: I am not alive, but I grow. I don’t have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
puzzles.hint: I consume, I crackle, I destroy.

puzzles.title: The Mirror Truth
puzzles.question: You see me in water but never get wet. What am I?
puzzles.hint: You follow it in mirrors… but it’s never real.

puzzles.title: The Final Knock
puzzles.question: I creep without legs, I whisper without a voice, I chill without touch. What am I?
puzzles.hint: It always follows, especially in dim light.
